item.name: Environment/Build/Building Threads
item.long: The number of threads to launch when building.

item.name: Environment/Build/Parallel Project Building
item.long: Selects whether to build projects or files within projects in parallel.

item.name: Environment/Splash Screen
item.long: How to display the splash screen on startup.

item.name: Environment/Macros/Global Macros
item.long: Build macros that are shared across all solutions and projects e.g. paths to library files.

item.name: Environment/Max Window Menu Items
item.long: The maximum number of windows appearing in the Windows menu.

item.name: Environment/LocalsWindow/Show Address Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable address column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/LocalsWindow/Show Size Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable size column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/LocalsWindow/Show Type Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable type column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/LocalsWindow/Show Member Functions
item.long: Controls whether C++ class member functions are displayed.

item.name: Environment/GlobalsWindow/Show Address Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable address column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/GlobalsWindow/Show Size Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable size column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/GlobalsWindow/Show Type Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable type column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/GlobalsWindow/Show Member Functions
item.long: Controls whether C++ class member functions are displayed.

item.name: Environment/AutosWindow/Show Address Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable address column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/AutosWindow/Show Size Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable size column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/AutosWindow/Show Type Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable type column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/AutosWindow/Show Member Functions
item.long: Controls whether C++ class member functions are displayed.

item.name: Environment/Watch1Window/Show Address Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable address column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Watch1Window/Show Size Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable size column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Watch1Window/Show Type Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable type column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Watch1Window/Show Member Functions
item.long: Controls whether C++ class member functions are displayed.

item.name: Environment/Watch2Window/Show Address Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable address column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Watch2Window/Show Size Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable size column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Watch2Window/Show Type Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable type column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Watch2Window/Show Member Functions
item.long: Controls whether C++ class member functions are displayed.

item.name: Environment/Watch3Window/Show Address Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable address column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Watch3Window/Show Size Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable size column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Watch3Window/Show Type Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable type column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Watch3Window/Show Member Functions
item.long: Controls whether C++ class member functions are displayed.

item.name: Environment/Watch4Window/Show Address Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable address column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Watch4Window/Show Size Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable size column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Watch4Window/Show Type Column
item.long: Controls whether the variable type column is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Watch4Window/Show Member Functions
item.long: Controls whether C++ class member functions are displayed.

item.name: Environment/Call Stack/Most Recent At Top
item.long: Controls whether the most recent call is at the top or the bottom of the list.

item.name: Environment/Call Stack/Show Parameter Names
item.long: Enables the display of parameter names in the call stack.

item.name: Environment/Call Stack/Show Parameter Values
item.long: Enables the display of parameter values in the call stack.

item.name: Environment/Call Stack/Show Parameter Types
item.long: Enables the display of parameter types in the call stack.

item.name: Environment/Call Stack/Show Call Location
item.long: Enables the display of the call source location in the call stack.

item.name: Environment/Call Stack/Show Call Address
item.long: Enables the display of the call address in the call stack.

item.name: Environment/Call Stack/Show Stack Pointer
item.long: Enables the display of the stack pointer in the call stack.

item.name: Environment/Call Stack/Show Stack Usage
item.long: Enables the display of the amount of stack used by the call.

item.name: Environment/Call Stack/Show Stack Usage In Bytes
item.long: Display the stack usage in bytes rather than words.

item.name: Environment/Call Stack/Show Cumulative Stack Usage
item.long: Enables the display of the amount of stack used.

item.name: Environment/Call Stack/Show Cumulative Stack Usage In Bytes
item.long: Display the stack usage in bytes rather than words.

item.name: Environment/Startup Action
item.long: Enables loading the previous session's solution on startup.

item.name: Environment/Permit Multiple Studio Instances
item.long: Allow more than one $(STUDIO_NAME) to run at the same time.

item.name: Environment/Launcher Enabled
item.long: Specifies whether the $(STUDIO_NAME) launcher should be used when the operating system or an external application requests a file to be opened.

item.name: Environment/Launcher Use Latest Installations Only
item.long: Specifies whether the $(STUDIO_NAME) launcher should only consider the latest installations when deciding which one to use.

item.name: Environment/Launcher/Confirm Check Solution Target
item.long: Specifies whether the $(STUDIO_NAME) launcher should present a warning if the solution being launched targets a device it does not support.

item.name: Text Editor/HScroll Bar
item.long: Show or hide the horizontal scroll bar.

item.name: Text Editor/VScroll Bar
item.long: Show or hide the vertical scroll bar.

item.name: Text Editor/Mini Toolbar
item.long: Show the mini toolbar when selecting text with the mouse.

item.name: Text Editor/Copy On Mouse Select
item.long: Automatically copy text to clipboard when marking a selection with the mouse.

item.name: Text Editor/Icon Gutter
item.long: Show or hide the left-hand gutter containing breakpoint, bookmark, and optional diagnostic icons.

item.name: Text Editor/Suggest Completion While Typing
item.short: Display Code Completion Suggestions While Typing
item.long: Enable code completion as you type without needing to use the show suggestions key (Ctrl+J).

item.name: Text Editor/Suggestion Selection Key
item.long: The key used to select a code completion suggestion.

item.name: Text Editor/Completion Replaces Existing Word
item.long: Replace existing word with completion suggestion if cursor is located on one.

item.name: Text Editor/Preprocessor Definition Suggestions
item.long: Include or exclude preprocessor definitions in code completion suggestions.

item.name: Text Editor/Template Suggestions
item.long: Include or exclude templates in code completion suggestions.

item.name: Text Editor/Template Suggestions Characters
item.long: The number of characters to match before suggesting a template.

item.name: Text Editor/FIXME Tags
item.long: Set the tags to display as FIXME comments.

item.name: Text Editor/ATTENTION Tags
item.long: Set the tags to display as ATTENTION comments.

item.name: Text Editor/LINT Tags
item.long: Set the tags to display as Lint directives.

item.name: Text Editor/Auto Surround
item.long: Enable or disable automatically surrounding selected text when typing triangular brackets, quotation marks, parentheses, brackets, or braces.

item.name: Text Editor/Auto Comment
item.long: Enable or disable automatically swapping commenting on source lines by typing '/' with an active selection.

item.name: Text Editor/Ask For Index
item.long: Ask to index the project if goto symbol fails in current editor context.

item.name: Text Editor/Show Tooltip
item.long: Show tooltips when hovering over symbols.

item.name: Text Editor/Mouse Wheel Adjusts Font Size
item.long: Enable or disable resizing of font by mouse wheel when CTRL key pressed.

item.name: Text Editor/Enable Popup Diagnostics
item.long: Enables on-screen diagnostics in the text editor.

item.name: Text Editor/Bold Popup Diagnostics
item.long: Displays popup diagnostic messages in bold for easier reading.

item.name: Text Editor/Diagnostic Cycle Mode
item.long: Iterates through diagnostics either from most severe to least severe or in reported order.
item.enumerates: Cycle Through Diagnostics By Severity;Cycle Through Diagnostics In Order

item.name: Text Editor/Drag Drop Editing
item.long: Enables dragging and dropping of selections in the text editor.

item.name: Text Editor/Column Mode Tab
item.long: Tab key moves to the next textual column using the line above.

item.name: Text Editor/Spell Checking
item.long: Enable spell checking in comments.

item.name: Text Editor/Delete Trailing Space On Save
item.long: Deletes trailing whitespace from each line when a file is saved.

item.name: Text Editor/Cleanup Tabs On Save
item.long: Cleans up tabs when a file is saved.
item.enumerates: Do Not Change Tabs;Change Tabs to Spaces;Change Spaces to Tabs

item.name: Text Editor/Default Line Endings
item.long: The line ending format to use for a new file or a file where the existing line ending format cannot be determined.

item.name: Text Editor/Show Inactive Code
item.long: Show code that has been conditionally excluded by the preprocessor.

item.name: Text Editor/Inactive Code Opacity
item.long: Specifies the opacity of code that has been conditionally excluded by the preprocessor.

item.name: Text Editor/Auto-Detect UTF-8
item.long: Auto-detect UTF-8 encoding without signature.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Default/Tab Size
item.long: The number of columns between tabstops.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Default/Size
item.long: The number of columns to indent a code block.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Default/Use Tabs
item.long: Insert tabs when indenting.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Default/Indent Mode
item.long: How to indent when a new line is inserted.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Default/Open Brace
item.long: Indent the opening brace of compound statements.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Default/Context Lines
item.long: The number of lines to use for context when indenting.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Default/Close Brace
item.long: Indent the closing brace of compound statements.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Default/Keywords
item.long: Additional identifiers to highlight as keywords.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Default/Column Guides
item.long: The columns that guides are drawn for.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Java/Tab Size
item.long: The number of columns between tabstops.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Java/Size
item.long: The number of columns to indent a code block.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Java/Use Tabs
item.long: Insert tabs when indenting.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Java/Indent Mode
item.long: How to indent when a new line is inserted.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Java/Open Brace
item.long: Indent the opening brace of compound statements.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Java/Context Lines
item.long: The number of lines to use for context when indenting.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Java/Close Brace
item.long: Indent the closing brace of compound statements.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Java/Keywords
item.long: Additional identifiers to highlight as keywords.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Java/Column Guides
item.long: The columns that guides are drawn for.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/C and C++/Tab Size
item.long: The number of columns between tabstops.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/C and C++/Size
item.long: The number of columns to indent a code block.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/C and C++/Use Tabs
item.long: Insert tabs when indenting.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/C and C++/Indent Mode
item.long: How to indent when a new line is inserted.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/C and C++/Open Brace
item.long: Indent the opening brace of compound statements.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/C and C++/Context Lines
item.long: The number of lines to use for context when indenting.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/C and C++/Close Brace
item.long: Indent the closing brace of compound statements.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/C and C++/Keywords
item.long: Additional identifiers to highlight as keywords.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/C and C++/Column Guides
item.long: The columns that guides are drawn for.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Assembly Language/Tab Size
item.long: The number of columns between tabstops.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Assembly Language/Size
item.long: The number of columns to indent a code block.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Assembly Language/Use Tabs
item.long: Insert tabs when indenting.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Assembly Language/Indent Mode
item.long: How to indent when a new line is inserted.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Assembly Language/Open Brace
item.long: Indent the opening brace of compound statements.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Assembly Language/Context Lines
item.long: The number of lines to use for context when indenting.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Assembly Language/Close Brace
item.long: Indent the closing brace of compound statements.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Assembly Language/Keywords
item.long: Additional identifiers to highlight as keywords.

item.name: Text Editor/Indent/Assembly Language/Column Guides
item.long: The columns that guides are drawn for.

item.name: Text Editor/ShowWidgetStrip
item.long: Show or hide the Editor toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/General/Ribbon/Show
item.long: Show or hide the ribbon.

item.name: Environment/Status Bar
item.long: Show or hide the status bar.

item.name: Environment/General/Status Bar/Show Target
item.long: Show or hide the Target pane in the status bar.

item.name: Environment/General/Status Bar/Show Build Status
item.long: Show or hide the Build pane in the status bar.

item.name: Environment/General/Status Bar/Show Insert Mode
item.long: Show or hide the Insert/Overwrite pane in the status bar.

item.name: Environment/General/Status Bar/Show Caret Pos
item.long: Show or hide the Caret Position pane in the status bar.

item.name: Environment/General/Status Bar/Show Read Only
item.long: Show or hide the Read Only pane in the status bar.

item.name: Environment/General/Status Bar/Show Time
item.long: Show or hide the Time pane in the status bar.

item.name: Environment/General/Status Bar/Show Size Grip
item.long: Show or hide the status bar size grip.

item.name: Environment/General/Title Bar/Show Full Solution Path
item.long: Show the full solution path in title bar.

item.name: Environment/Size Display Unit
item.long: How to display sizes of items in the user interface. SI defines 1kB=1000 bytes, IEC defines 1kiB=1024 bytes, Alternate SI defines 1kB=1024 bytes.

item.name: Environment/General/Large Icons
item.long: Show large or small icons on toolbars.

item.name: Environment/Error Display Mode
item.long: How errors are reported in $(STUDIO_NAME).

item.name: Environment/Number Menus
item.long: Number the first nine file names in menus for quick keyboard access.

item.name: Environment/Show Selector
item.long: Present the Window Selector on Next Window and Previous Window commands activated from the keyboard.

item.name: Environment/Qt Style Sheet
item.long: The Qt style sheet to use in order to customize the user interface (experimental).

item.name: Environment/Studio Theme
item.long: The user interface style and color theme to use.

item.name: Environment/Error Display Timeout
item.long: The minimum time, in seconds, that errors are shown for in the status bar.

item.name: Text Editor/Highlight Cursor Line
item.long: Enable or disable visually highlighting the cursor line.

item.name: Text Editor/Highlight All Selected Text
item.long: Enable or disable visually highlighting all text that matches the current selection.

item.name: Text Editor/Font
item.long: The font to use for text editors.

item.name: Text Editor/Font Rendering
item.long: The font rendering scheme to use in text editors.

item.name: Text Editor/Antialias Threshold
item.long: The minimum size for font smoothing: font sizes smaller than this will have antialiasing turned off.

item.name: Text Editor/Confirm Modified File Reload
item.long: Display a confirmation prompt before reloading a file that has been modified on disk.

item.name: Project Explorer/Confirm Configuration Folder Delete
item.long: Display a confirmation prompt before deleting a configuration folder cotaining properties.

if.long: Display a confirmation prompt before forgetting property modifications.

ifnot.long: Display a confirmation prompt before forgetting option modifications.

item.name: Project Explorer/Confirm File Replacement Warning
item.long: Display a confirmation prompt before replacing project files for import and creation

item.name: Text Editor/Backup File Depth
item.long: The number of backup files to keep when saving an existing file.

item.name: Text Editor/Auto Recovery Backup Time
item.long: The time in minutes between saving of auto recovery backups files or 0 to disable generation of backup files.

item.name: Text Editor/Auto Recovery Keep Time
item.long: The time in days to keep unrecovered backup files or 0 to disable deletion of unrecovered backup files.

item.name: Environment/Application Main Font
item.long: The font to use for the user interface as a whole.

item.name: Environment/Application Monospace Font
item.long: The fixed-size font to use for the user interface as a whole.

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Favorite Properties
item.long: The favorite list of properties that are displayed starred and before other properties in the Project Explorer.

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Starred File Names
item.long: The list of wildcard-matched file names that are highligted with stars, to bring attention to themselves, in the Project Explorer.

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/External Editor
item.long: The file name of the application to use as the external text editor. The external editor is started by holding down the Shift key when opening files from the project explorer.

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Sync Editor
item.long: Synchronizes the Project Explorer with the document being edited.

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Color Nodes
item.long: Show the project nodes colored for identification in the Project Explorer.

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Show Non-Local Overlay
item.long: Show an overlay on an item if it is not held within the project directory.

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Show Dynamic Overlay
item.long: Show an overlay on an item if it is populated from a dynamic folder.

if.long: Show if a folder or file has modified properties as a badge in the Project Explorer.

ifnot.long: Show if a folder or file has modified options as a badge in the Project Explorer.

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Count Files
item.long: Show the number of files contained in a folder as a badge in the Project Explorer.

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Count Projects
item.long: Show the number of projects contained in a solution as a badge in the Project Explorer.

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Statistics Display
item.long: Show the code and data size columns in the Project Explorer.

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Statistics Format
item.long: Show exact or rounded sizes in the project explorer.
item.enumerates: Size In Bytes;Sizes Rounded to Nearest 0.1K

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Statistics Read-Only Data Handling
item.long: Configures whether read-only data contributes to the Code or Data statistic.
item.enumerates: Include in Data Statistic;Include in Code Statistic

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Dependencies Display
item.long: Controls how the dependencies are displayed.
item.enumerates: Dependencies Off;Dependencies Under Node;Dependencies In Folder

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Context Menu Common Folder
item.long: Controls how common options are displayed by the Project Explorer's context menu.

if.long: Controls how the properties are displayed.
if.enumerates: Properties Off;Properties Under Node;Properties In Folder

ifnot.long: Controls how the options are displayed.
ifnot.enumerates: Options Off;Options Under Node;Options In Folder

if.long: Controls how common properties are displayed.

ifnot.long: Controls how common options are displayed.

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Show Output Files
item.long: Show the build output files in an Output Files folder in the project explorer.

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Show Source Control Column
item.long: Show the source control status column in the project explorer.

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Show Source Control Annotation
item.long: Annotate items in the project explorer with their source control status.

if.long: Controls where edit properties is displayed by the Project Explorer's context menu.

ifnot.short: Context Menu Edit Options At Top
ifnot.long: Controls where Edit Options are displayed by the Project Explorer's context menu.

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Context Menu Show Favorites
item.long: Controls if favorite properties are displayed by the Project Explorer's context menu.

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Check Solution Target
item.long: Specifies whether to check target is correct when loading a solution.

item.name: Environment/Windows/Show Sizes
item.short: Show Line Count and File Size
item.long: Show the number of lines and size of each file in the windows list.

item.name: Environment/Windows/Grouping
item.long: How the files are grouped or listed in the Windows window.

item.name: Environment/Windows/Show Filename Tooltips
item.long: Show the full file name as a tooltip when hovering over files in the Windows window.

item.name: Windows/Outline/Preview Refresh Mode
item.long: How the Preview pane refreshes its contects.

item.name: Windows/Outline/Group Defines
item.long: Group consecutive #define and #undef preprocessor directives.

item.name: Windows/Outline/Group Top Level Items
item.long: Group consecutive top-level variable and type declarations.

item.name: Windows/Outline/Hide Region Prefix
item.long: Hides the '#region' prefix from groups and shows only the group name.

item.name: Windows/Outline/Group Ifs
item.long: Group lines contained betwen #if, #else, and #endif preprocessor directives.

item.name: Windows/Outline/Group Includes
item.long: Group consecutive #include preprocessor directives.

item.name: Windows/Outline/Group Visibility
item.long: Group class members by public, protected, and private visibility.

item.name: Windows/Source Navigator/Show Definitions Only
item.long: Show definitions only. When set to Yes only symbols that are defined will be included in the source navigator display. When set to No declarations of symbols will also be included in the source navigator display.

item.name: Text Editor/Numeric Keypad Enabled
item.long: Selects whether the numeric keypad plus and minus buttons copy and cut text.

item.name: Text Editor/Cut Blank Lines
item.long: Selects whether to place text on the clipboard when a single blank line is cut. When set to Yes, cutting a single blank line will put the blank line on the clipboard. When set to No, cutting a single blank line deletes the line and does not place it on the clipboard.

item.name: Text Editor/Cut Action
item.long: What Cut cuts when nothing is selected.

item.name: Text Editor/Copy Action
item.long: What Copy copies when nothing is selected.

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Middle Click Action
item.long: The action the editor performs on Middle Click.
item.enumerates: Default;Go To Definition;Find References;Find in Solution;Find Help;Go To Method;Go To Include;Paste

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Shift+Middle Click Action
item.long: The action the editor performs on Shift+Middle Click.
item.enumerates: Default;Go To Definition;Find References;Find in Solution;Find Help;Go To Method;Go To Include;Paste

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Shift+Right Click Action
item.long: The action the editor performs on Shift+Right Click.
item.enumerates: Default;Go To Definition;Find References;Find in Solution;Find Help;Go To Method;Go To Include;Paste

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Ctrl+Left Click Action
item.long: The action the editor performs on Ctrl+Left Click.
item.enumerates: Default;Go To Definition;Find References;Find in Solution;Find Help;Go To Method;Go To Include;Paste

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Ctrl+Middle Click Action
item.long: The action the editor performs on Ctrl+Middle Click.
item.enumerates: Default;Go To Definition;Find References;Find in Solution;Find Help;Go To Method;Go To Include;Paste

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Ctrl+Right Click Action
item.long: The action the editor performs on Ctrl+Right Click.
item.enumerates: Default;Go To Definition;Find References;Find in Solution;Find Help;Go To Method;Go To Include;Paste

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Alt+Left Click Action
item.long: The action the editor performs on Alt+Left Click.
item.enumerates: Default;Go To Definition;Find References;Find in Solution;Find Help;Go To Method;Go To Include;Paste

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Alt+Middle Click Action
item.long: The action the editor performs on Alt+Middle Click.
item.enumerates: Default;Go To Definition;Find References;Find in Solution;Find Help;Go To Method;Go To Include;Paste

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Alt+Right Click Action
item.long: The action the editor performs on Alt+Right Click.
item.enumerates: Default;Go To Definition;Find References;Find in Solution;Find Help;Go To Method;Go To Include;Paste

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Filename Replace Macros
item.long: Macros (system and global) used to replace the start of a filename on project file addition.

item.name: Text Editor/Hide Cursor When Typing
item.long: Hide or show the I-beam cursor when you start to type.

item.name: Text Editor/Ibeam cursor
item.long: Show an I-beam or arrow cursor in the text editor.

item.name: Text Editor/Auto Expand Templates
item.long: Enables automatic expansion of templates when the space key is pressed.

item.name: Text Editor/Enable Virtual Space
item.long: Permit the cursor to move into locations that do not currently contain text.

item.name: Text Editor/Tab Key Indents Preprocessor Directives
item.long: Enables or disables the indentation of C preprocessor directives when using tab key indentation on a selection.

item.name: Text Editor/View Whitespace
item.long: Make whitespace characters visible in the text editor.

item.name: Text Editor/Insert Caret Style
item.long: How the caret is displayed with the editor in insert mode.
item.enumerates: Blinking Vertical Bar;Blinking Block;Blinking Underline;Steady Vertical Bar;Steady Block;Steady Underline

item.name: Text Editor/Overwrite Caret Style
item.long: How the caret is displayed with the editor in overwrite mode.
item.enumerates: Blinking Vertical Bar;Blinking Block;Blinking Underline;Steady Vertical Bar;Steady Block;Steady Underline

item.name: Text Editor/Line Number Mode
item.long: How often line numbers are displayed in the margin.

item.name: Text Editor/Mate Matching Mode
item.long: Controls when braces, brackets, and parentheses are matched.

item.name: Text Editor/Mate Match Off Screen
item.long: Specifies whether braces, brackets, and parentheses are matched when off screen.

item.name: Text Editor/Default Codec
item.long: The encoding to use if not overridden by a project property or file is not in a known format.

item.name: Text Editor/Diagnostic Icons
item.long: Enables display of diagnostic icons in the icon gutter.

item.name: Text Editor/Edit Read Only
item.long: Allow editing of read-only files.

item.name: Text Editor/Undo Mode
item.long: How Undo and Redo group your typing when it is undone and redone.
item.enumerates: Individual Characters;Individual Words;Whole Of Last Insertion

item.name: Text Editor/Find/History
item.long: The list of strings recently used in searches.

item.name: Text Editor/Replace/History
item.long: The list of strings recently used in replaces.

item.name: Text Editor/Find/Match Whole Word
item.long: Enables or disables whole word matching when searching.

item.name: Text Editor/Find/Match Case
item.long: Enables or disables the case sensitivity of letters when searching.

item.name: Text Editor/Find/Use RegExp
item.long: Enables regular expression matching rather than plain text matching.

item.name: Text Editor/Margins/Enabled
item.long: Enable margins to fence and scroll around the cursor.

item.name: Text Editor/Margins/Left
item.long: The number of characters in the left margin.

item.name: Text Editor/Margins/Right
item.long: The number of characters in the right margin.

item.name: Text Editor/Margins/Top
item.long: The number of lines in the right margin.

item.name: Text Editor/Margins/Bottom
item.long: The number of lines in the bottom margin.

item.name: Text Editor/Additional Formatting Styles
item.long: Additional styles to pass to clang-format.

item.name: Text Editor/Extra Formatting/LinesAtEOF
item.short: Empty Lines At End Of File
item.long: The number of lines to add at the end of the file.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/AccessModifierOffset
item.long: The extra indent or outdent of access modifiers, e.g. public:.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/AlignAfterOpenBracket
item.long: If enabled, horizontally aligns arguments after an open bracket.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/AlignConsecutiveAssignments
item.long: If enabled, aligns consecutive assignments.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/AlignConsecutiveDeclarations
item.long: If enabled, aligns consecutive declarations.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/AlignEscapedNewlinesLeft
item.long: If enabled, aligns escaped newlines as far left as possible otherwise puts them into the right-most column.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/AlignOperands
item.long: If enabled, horizontally align operands of binary and ternary expressions.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/AlignTrailingComments
item.long: If enabled, aligns trailing comments.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/AllowAllParametersOfDeclarationOnNextLine
item.short: Allow All Parameters Of Declaration On Next Line
item.long: Allow putting all parameters of a function declaration onto the next line even if Bin-pack Parameters is disabled.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/AllowShortBlocksOnASingleLine
item.short: Allow Short Blocks On A Single Line
item.long: If enabled, allows contracting simple braced statements to a single line.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/AllowShortCaseLabelsOnASingleLine
item.short: Allow Short Case Labels On A Single Line
item.long: If enabled, short case labels will be contracted to a single line.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/AllowShortFunctionsOnASingleLine
item.short: Allow Short Functions On A Single Line
item.long: Optionally compress small functions to a single line.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/AllowShortIfStatementsOnASingleLine
item.short: Allow Short 'if' Statements On A Single Line
item.long: If enabled, short 'if' statements are put on a single line.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/AllowShortLoopsOnASingleLine
item.short: Allow Short Loop Statements On A Single Line
item.long: If enabled, short loop statements are put on a single line.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/AlwaysBreakAfterReturnType
item.long: The function declaration return type breaking style to use.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/AlwaysBreakBeforeMultilineStrings
item.long: If enabled, always break before multiline strings.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/AlwaysBreakTemplateDeclarations
item.long: If enabled, always break after the 'template<...>' of a template declaration.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/BinPackArguments
item.long: If disabled, a function call’s arguments will either be all on the same line or will have one line each.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/BinPackParameters
item.long: If disabled, a function call's or function definition's parameters will either all be on the same line or will have one line each.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/BreakBeforeBinaryOperators
item.long: The way to wrap binary operators.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/BreakBeforeBraces
item.long: The brace breaking style to use.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/BreakBeforeInheritanceComma
item.long: If enabled, the class inheritance expression will break before : and , if there is multiple inheritance.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/BreakBeforeTernaryOperators
item.long: If enabled, ternary operators will be placed after line breaks.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/BreakConstructorInitializersBeforeComma
item.long: If enabled, always break constructor initializers before commas and align the commas with the colon.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/BreakStringLiterals
item.long: Allow breaking string literals when formatting.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/ColumnLimit
item.long: The column limit which limits the width of formatted lines.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/CommentPragmas
item.long: A regular expression that describes comments with special meaning, which should not be split into lines or otherwise changed.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/CompactNamespaces
item.long: If enabled, consecutive namespace declarations will be on the same line. If disabled, each namespace is declared on a new line.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/ConstructorInitializerAllOnOneLineOrOnePerLine
item.short: Constructor Initializer All On One Line Or One Per Line
item.long: If enabled and the constructor initializers don't fit on a line, put each initializer on its own line.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/ConstructorInitializerIndentWidth
item.long: The number of characters to use for indentation of constructor initializer lists.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/ContinuationIndentWidth
item.long: Indent width for line continuations.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/Cpp11BracedListStyle
item.long: If enabled, format braced lists as best suited for C++11 braced lists.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/DerivePointerAlignment
item.long: If enabled, analyze the formatted file for the most common alignment of address of and dereference. PointerAlignment is then used only as fallback.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/FixNamespaceComments
item.long: If enabled, add missing namespace end comments and fix invalid existing ones.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/ForEachMacros
item.long: A list of macros that should be interpreted as foreach loops rather than function calls.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/IncludeIsMainRegex
item.long: Specify a regular expression of suffixes that are allowed in the file-to-main-include mapping.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/IndentCaseLabels
item.long: If enabled, indent case labels one level from the switch statement.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/IndentWidth
item.long: The number of columns the code formatter uses for indentation. Note that this is not the indent width used by the text editor, that value is specified in the 'Languages' environment option group.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/IndentWrappedFunctionNames
item.long: If enabled, Indent if a function definition or declaration is wrapped after the type.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/KeepEmptyLinesAtTheStartOfBlocks
item.short: Keep Empty Lines At The Start Of Blocks
item.long: If enabled, empty lines at the start of blocks are kept.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/MacroBlockBegin
item.long: A regular expression matching macros that start a block.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/MacroBlockEnd
item.long: A regular expression matching macros that end a block.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/MaxEmptyLinesToKeep
item.long: The maximum number of consecutive empty lines to keep.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/NamespaceIndentation
item.long: The indentation used for namespaces.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/PenaltyBreakAssignment
item.long: The penalty for breaking around an assignment operator.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/PenaltyBreakBeforeFirstCallParameter
item.short: Penalty Break Before First Call Parameter
item.long: The penalty for breaking a function call after 'call('.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/PenaltyBreakComment
item.long: The penalty for each line break introduced inside a comment.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/PenaltyBreakFirstLessLess
item.long: The penalty for breaking before the first less-less.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/PenaltyBreakString
item.long: The penalty for each line break introduced inside a string literal.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/PenaltyExcessCharacter
item.long: The penalty for each character outside of the column limit.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/PenaltyReturnTypeOnItsOwnLine
item.short: Penalty Return Type On Its Own Line
item.long: Penalty for putting the return type of a function onto its own line.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/PointerAlignment
item.long: Pointer and reference alignment style.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/ReflowComments
item.long: If enabled, clang-format will attempt to re-flow comments.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/SortIncludes
item.long: If enabled, sort #includes.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/SortUsingDeclarations
item.long: If enabled, sort using declarations.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/SpaceAfterCStyleCast
item.long: If enabled, a space may be inserted after C style casts.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/SpaceAfterTemplateKeyword
item.long: If enabled, a space will be inserted after the ‘template’ keyword.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/SpaceBeforeAssignmentOperators
item.long: If disabled spaces will be removed before assignment operators.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/SpaceBeforeParens
item.long: Defines in which cases to put a space before opening parentheses.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/SpaceInEmptyParentheses
item.long: If enabled, spaces may be inserted into '()'.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/SpacesBeforeTrailingComments
item.long: The number of spaces before trailing line comments.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/SpacesInAngles
item.long: If enabled, spaces will be inserted around the angle brackets in template argument lists.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/SpacesInCStyleCastParentheses
item.long: If enabled, spaces may be inserted into C style casts.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/SpacesInContainerLiterals
item.long: If enabled, spaces are inserted inside container literals.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/SpacesInParentheses
item.long: If true, spaces will be inserted after '(' and before ')'.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/SpacesInSquareBrackets
item.long: If true, spaces will be inserted after '[' and before ']'.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/Standard
item.long: Format compatible with this standard

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/TabWidth
item.long: The number of columns the code formatter uses for tab stops. Note that this is not the tab width used by the text editor, that value is specified in the 'Languages' environment option group.

item.name: Text Editor/Formatting/UseTab
item.long: The way to use hard tab characters in the resulting file.

item.name: Text Editor/FormattingStyle
item.long: Select a set of formatting options based on a named standard.

item.name: Text Editor/Use .clang-format File
item.long: Load code formatting style configuration from a .clang-format file located in one of the parent directories of the source file rather than use the formatting options.

item.name: Find/Greedy RegExp
item.long: Enables greedy matching when using regular expressions.

item.name: Find In Files/Find History
item.long: The list of strings recently used in searches.

item.name: Find In Files/Replace History
item.long: The list of strings recently used in searches.

item.name: Find In Files/File Type
item.long: The wildcard used to match files in Find In Files searches.

item.name: Find In Files/Folder History
item.long: The set of folders recently used in file searches.

item.name: Find In Files/Match Whole Word
item.long: Whether the whole word must match when searching.

item.name: Find In Files/Search Dependencies
item.long: Controls searching of dependent files."

item.name: Find In Files/Match Case
item.long: Whether the case of letters must match exactly when searching.

item.name: Find In Files/Use RegExp
item.long: Whether to use a regular expression or plain text search.

item.name: Find In Files/Context
item.long: Where to look to find files.
item.enumerates: Current Document;All Open Documents;Current Project;Entire Solution;Single Folder Only;Folder And Sub-folders

item.name: Find In Files/Flat Output
item.long: Whether to display file search results as a flat list.

item.name: Find In Files/Collapse Results
item.long: Whether to initially collapse search results.

item.name: Environment/General/Solution Directory
item.long: The directory where projects are created.

item.name: Environment/General/Project Templates
item.long: The project templates file.

item.name: Environment/Printing/Left Margin
item.long: The page's left margin in millimetres.

item.name: Environment/Printing/Right Margin
item.long: The page's right margin in millimetres.

item.name: Environment/Printing/Top Margin
item.long: The page's top margin in millimetres.

item.name: Environment/Printing/Bottom Margin
item.long: The page's bottom margin in millimetres.

item.name: Environment/Printing/Orientation
item.long: The page's orientation.

item.name: Environment/Printing/Page Size
item.long: The page's size.

item.name: Environment/Build/Tool Chain Root Directory
item.long: Specifies where to find the toolchain (compilers etc).

item.name: Environment/Build/Confirm Debugger Stop
item.long: Present a warning when you start to build that requires the debugger to stop.

item.name: Environment/Build/Show Command Lines
item.long: Selects whether build command lines are written to the build log.

item.name: Environment/Build/Show Unparsed Error Output
item.long: Selects whether the unprocessed error and warning output from tools is displayed in the build log.

item.name: Environment/Build/Build Before Debug
item.long: Enables auto-building of a project before downloading if it is out of date.

item.name: Environment/Build/Find Error After Build
item.long: Moves the cursor to the first diagnostic after a build completes with errors.

item.name: Environment/Build/Save Project File On Build
item.long: Selects whether to save the project file prior to build.

item.name: Environment/Build/Show Build Information
item.long: Show build information.

item.name: Environment/Build/Keep Going On Error
item.long: Build doesn't stop on error.

item.name: Environment/Build/Disable Unity Build
item.long: Ignore Unity Build project properties and always build individual project components.

item.name: Environment/Build/Display Progress Bar
item.long: Selects whether to display progress bar on building.

item.name: Environment/Build/Display ETA
item.long: Selects whether to attempt to compute and display the ETA on building.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Default Variable Display Mode
item.long: Selects the format that data values are shown in.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Extended Tooltip Display Mode/ASCII
item.long: Display ASCII extended data tips.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Extended Tooltip Display Mode/Binary
item.long: Display Binary extended data tips.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Extended Tooltip Display Mode/Octal
item.long: Display Octal extended data tips.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Extended Tooltip Display Mode/Decimal
item.long: Display Decimal extended data tips.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Extended Tooltip Display Mode/Unsigned Decimal
item.long: Display Unsigned Decimal extended data tips.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Extended Tooltip Display Mode/Hexadecimal
item.long: Display Hexadecimal extended data tips.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Maximum Array Elements Displayed
item.short: Data Tips Display a Maximum Of
item.long: Selects the maximum number of array elements displayed in a data tip.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Maximum Backtrace Calls
item.long: Selects the maximum number of calls when backtracing.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Array Elements Prompt Size
item.short: Prompt To Display If More Than
item.long: The array size to display with prompt.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Floating Point Format Display
item.long: The printf format directive used to display floating point numbers.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Display Char Ptr As String
item.short: Show char * as null terminated string
item.long: Show char * as null terminated string.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Source Path
item.long: Global search path to find source files.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Clear Disassembly Breakpoint
item.short: Clear Disassembly Breakpoints On Debug Stop
item.long: Clear Disassembly Breakpoints On Debug Stop.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Disassembly Show Labels
item.long: Show Labels In Disassembly.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Close Disassembly On Mode Switch
item.long: Close Disassembly On Mode Switch.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Disassembly Show Source
item.long: Show Source In Disassembly.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Step Using Hardware Step
item.long: Step using hardware single stepping rather than setting breakpoints.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Show Data Tips
item.short: Show Data Tips In Text Editor
item.long: Show Data Tips In Text Editor.

item.name: Environment/Debugger/Switch Project
item.long: Switch Project To Text Editor.

item.name: Environment/Memory Window/Scroll Wheel Modifies Start Address
item.long: Selects whether the mouse scroll wheel can change the memory window start address.

item.name: Environment/Memory Window/Confirm Size
item.long: Present a warning if you attempt to download a large amount of memory in the memory window.

item.name: Environment/Properties Windows/Show Details
item.long: Show or hide the property description.

item.name: Environment/Properties Windows/Property Display Format
item.long: Set how the properties are displayed.

item.name: Environment/Properties Windows/Favorites Grouped
item.long: Assign favorites to their own group.

item.name: Environment/Properties Windows/Public Setting Check
item.long: Warn when setting property in public configuration.

item.name: Environment/Source Code Control/Immediate Commit
item.long: Bypasses the confirmation dialog and immediately commits items.

item.name: Environment/Source Code Control/Immediate Update
item.long: Bypasses the confirmation dialog and immediately updates items.

item.name: Environment/Source Code Control/Immediate Revert
item.long: Bypasses the confirmation dialog and immediately revert items.

item.name: Environment/Source Code Control/Immediate Resolved
item.long: Bypasses the confirmation dialog and immediately mark items resolved.

item.name: Environment/Source Code Control/Immediate Lock
item.long: Bypasses the confirmation dialog and immediately locks items.

item.name: Environment/Source Code Control/Immediate Unlock
item.long: Bypasses the confirmation dialog and immediately unlocks items.

item.name: Environment/Source Code Control/Immediate Add
item.long: Bypasses the confirmation dialog and immediately adds items to source control.

item.name: Environment/Source Code Control/Immediate Remove
item.long: Bypasses the confirmation dialog and immediately removes items from source control.

item.name: Environment/Source Code Control/Immediate Get
item.long: Bypasses the confirmation dialog and immediately gets items from source control.

item.name: Environment/Source Code Control/DiffCommand
item.long: The diff command line.

item.name: Environment/Source Code Control/MergeCommand
item.long: The merge command line.

item.name: Environment/Show Transcript On Build
item.long: Show the build log when a build starts.

item.name: Debugging/Show Transcript On Load
item.long: Show the target log when a load starts.

item.name: Debugging/Hide Transcript On Successful Load
item.short: Hide Output Window On Successful Load
item.long: Hide the Output window when a load completes without error.

item.name: Environment/Clear Debug Terminal On Run
item.long: Clear the debug terminal automatically when a program is run.

item.name: Environment/Clipboard Ring/Max Entries
item.long: The maximum number of items held on the clipboard ring before they are recycled.

item.name: Environment/Clipboard Ring/Save
item.long: Save the clipboard ring across $(STUDIO_NAME) runs.

item.name: Environment/External Web Browser
item.long: The path to the external web browser to use when accessing non-local files.

item.name: Environment/Internet/Enable Debugging
item.long: Controls debugging traces of internet connections and downloads.

item.name: Environment/Internet/RSS Update
item.long: Specifies whether to update the latest news window.

item.name: Environment/Internet/Check Updates
item.long: Specifies whether to check for software updates.

item.name: Environment/Internet/Check Packages
item.long: Specifies whether to enable downloading of the list of available packages.

item.name: Environment/Internet/HTTP Proxy Port
item.long: Specifies the HTTP proxy server's port number.

item.name: Environment/Internet/HTTP Proxy Server
item.long: Specifies the IP address or hostname of the HTTP proxy server. If empty, no HTTP proxy server will be used.

item.name: Environment/Internet/HTTP Backend
item.long: Specifies which HTTP implementation to use for downloads.

item.name: Environment/Internet/HTTP Caching
item.long: Specifies if caching should be permitted when carrying out HTTP requests.

item.name: Environment/Internet/Max Download History Items
item.long: The maximum amount of download history kept in the downloads window.

item.name: Environment/Browser/Underline Web Links
item.long: Enables underlining of hypertext links in the integrated HTML and help browser.

item.name: Environment/Browser/Text Size
item.long: Sets the text size of the integrated HTML and help browser.

item.name: Environment/Package/Use Content Delivery Network
item.long: Specifies whether to use content delivery network to deliver packages."

item.name: Environment/Package/Destination Directory
item.long: Specifies the directory packages are installed to.

item.name: Environment/Package/Check Solution Package Dependencies
item.long: Specifies whether to check package dependencies when a solution is loaded.

item.name: Environment/Package/Show Logos
item.long: Specifies whether the package manager should display company logos.

item.name: Environment/Package/Verify Downloads
item.long: Specifies whether to carry out an MD5 sum check on downloaded package files.

item.name: Debug Terminal/Use Window System Colors
item.long: Substitute window system colors for ANSI black background and white foreground in debug terminal.

item.name: Debug Terminal/Backscroll Buffer Lines
item.long: The number of lines you can see when you scroll backward in the debug terminal window.

item.name: Environment/Load Last Project On Startup
item.long: Specifies whether to load the last project the next time $(STUDIO_NAME) runs.

item.name: Environment/Package/Show Check For Packages Dialog
item.long: Specifies whether the package manager should prompt for a package list refresh.

item.name: Target/Auto Connect
item.long: Enable automatic connection to last connected target when debug start pressed.

item.name: Target/Auto Disconnect
item.long: Enable automatic disconnection on debug stop.

item.name: Target/Identify
item.long: Note that turning this off may make a malfunctioning target connection appear as if it is working.

item.name: Target/Enable Load Verification
item.long: Verify that a program has been successfully downloaded after download.

item.name: Target/Enable Processor Check
item.short: Check Project And Target Processor Compatibility
item.long: Verify that the project-defined processor is compatible with the connected target processor.

item.name: Target/Enable Differential Download
item.long: Verify the contents of memory prior to download and only download the code and data that is different.

item.name: Environment/Targets Window/Background Target Scan
item.short: Background Scan for Debug Pod Presence
item.long: Scan USB devices to detect if debug pods are plugged in which may affect $(STUDIO_NAME) response.

item.name: Environment/Source Code Control/CVSExecutable
item.long: The CVS executable.

item.name: Environment/Source Code Control/CVSRoot
item.long: The CVSROOT (-d) value.

item.name: Environment/Dock Window Buttons
item.long: Select whether one button or multiple buttons are shown for documents in window groups.

item.name: Environment/Dock Window Headers
item.long: Select whether dock window title bars are shown.

item.name: Environment/Debug Terminal/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Debug Terminal toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/EEM Registers/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the EEM Registers toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/EEM State Storage/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the EEM State Storage toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/EEM Triggers/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the EEM Triggers toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Project Explorer/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Project Explorer toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Memory Usage/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Memory Usage toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Downloads/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Downloads toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Latest News/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Latest News toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Latest News/Grouping
item.long: How to display the RSS feed articles.
item.enumerates: Grouped by date;Grouped by date;Grouped by category

item.name: Environment/Calcpad/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Calcpad toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Properties Window/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Properties Window toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Terminal Emulator/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Terminal Emulator toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Terminal Emulator/Local Echo
item.long: Displays every character typed before sending to the remote computer.

item.name: Terminal Emulator/Backscroll Buffer Lines
item.long: The number of lines you can see when you scroll backward in the terminal emulator window.

item.name: Terminal Emulator/Maximum Input Block Size
item.long: The maximum number of bytes to read at a time.

item.name: Terminal Emulator/Line Feed On Carriage Return
item.long: Append a line feed character when a carriage return character is received.

if.long: The communications port to use, e.g. /dev/ttyS0, /dev/ttyS1, etc.
The communications port to use, e.g. /dev/tty.usbserial etc.
The communications port to use, e.g. COM1, COM2 etc.

item.name: Terminal Emulator/Communications/Baud Rate
item.long: Baud rate used when transmitting and receiving data.

item.name: Terminal Emulator/Communications/Stop Bits
item.long: Number of stop bits to use when transmitting data.

item.name: Terminal Emulator/Communications/Data Bits
item.long: Number of data bits to use when transmitting and receiving data.

item.name: Terminal Emulator/Communications/Parity
item.long: Parity used when transmitting and receiving data.

item.name: Terminal Emulator/Communications/Flow Control
item.long: The flow control method to use.

item.name: Terminal Emulator/Communications/DTR
item.long: Set the DTR signal.

item.name: Terminal Emulator/Communications/Port Used By Target Interface
item.long: The COM port will be disconnected when the target interface is connected and reconnected when the target interface is disconnected.

item.name: Environment/Clipboard Ring/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Clipboard Ring toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Windows/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Windows toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Output/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Output toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Find And Replace/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Find And Replace toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/JavaScript Console/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the JavaScript Console toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Symbol Browser/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Symbol Browser toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Symbol Browser/Grouping
item.long: Selects how to sort or group the symbols displayed.
item.enumerates: Group By Section;Group By Source File;Group By Type;Sort Alphabetically

item.name: Environment/Symbol Browser/Display Value
item.long: Selects whether the Value field is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Symbol Browser/Display Range
item.long: Selects whether the Range field is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Symbol Browser/Display Size
item.long: Selects whether the Size field is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Symbol Browser/Display Section
item.long: Selects whether the Section field is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Symbol Browser/Display Type
item.long: Selects whether the Type field is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Symbol Browser/Display Frame Size
item.long: Selects whether the Frame Size field is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Symbol Browser/Display Code
item.long: Selects whether the Code field is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Symbol Browser/Display Data
item.long: Selects whether the Data field is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Symbol Browser/Display Const
item.long: Selects whether the Const field is displayed.

item.name: Environment/Breakpoints/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Breakpoints toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Code Outline/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Code Outline toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Spotlight/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Spotlight toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Locals/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Locals toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Globals/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Globals toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Autos/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Autos toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Watch 1/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Watch 1 toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Watch 2/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Watch 2 toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Watch 3/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Watch 3 toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Watch 4/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Watch 4 toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Registers 1/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Registers 1 toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Registers 2/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Registers 2 toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Registers 3/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Registers 3 toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Registers 4/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Registers 4 toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Threads/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Threads toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Call Stack/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Call Stack toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Memory 1/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Memory 1 toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Memory 2/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Memory 2 toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Memory 3/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Memory 3 toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Memory 4/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Memory 4 toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Preview/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Preview toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Disassembly/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Disassembly toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Execution Trace/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Execution Trace toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Execution Profile/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Execution Profile toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Tip of the Day/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Tip of the Day toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Tip of the Day/Show at Startup
item.long: Show a new tip each day when the program is run.

item.name: Environment/Bookmarks/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Bookmarks toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Source Navigator/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Source Navigator toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Contents/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Contents toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Targets/Dock Toolbar
item.long: Show or hide the Targets toolbar in the dock window.

item.name: Environment/Support Reminder Nag
item.long: Specifies whether to show the support expired dialog.

item.name: Environment/Check J-Link Licenses
item.long: Specifies whether to check J-Link's for licenses.

item.name: ElfDwarf/Environment/Executable File Extensions
item.long: The file extensions used for ELF executable files.

item.name: ElfDwarf/Environment/Archive File Extensions
item.long: The file extensions used for ELF archive files.

item.name: ElfDwarf/Environment/Object File Extensions
item.long: The file extensions used for ELF object files.

item.name: ElfDwarf/Environment/Show ELF Header
item.long: Display ELF Headers when executable and object files are displayed in text editor.

item.name: ARM/Build/StudioDir Directory
item.long: The installation directory to be used for building - the value $(StudioDir) is set to.

item.name: ARM/Build/Compiler Variant Default
item.long: Specifies the default compiler variant to use.

item.name: ARM/Build/Assembler Variant Default
item.long: Specifies the default assembler variant to use.

item.name: ARM/Build/Use Compiler Driver
item.long: Specifies the default for the Use Compiler Driver project property.

item.name: ARM/Debugger/Ozone Executable
item.long: The path to the Ozone executable.
